channel.title: nlp-movie-review on AW - notes & thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in nlp-movie-review on AW - notes & thoughts

item.title: 1 - Movie sentiment review
item.description: Intro Here, I just scratch the surface of NLP, by commenting my colab notebook which builds the backend of a sentiment movie review app from the ground up exploiting Keras’ TextVectorization. You are expected to be familiar with the following concepts and tools: Basics of Machine learning and data manipulation: did you try the Titanic dataset? Basics of Keras API: you got at least on neural network with Keras tutorial I will try to provide crash-course on word vectors and text vectorization.
